titles.title: Recognizing National Native American Heritage Month and celebrating the heritages and cultures of Native Americans and the contributions of Native Americans to the United States.
Recognizing National Native American Heritage Month and celebrating the heritages and cultures of Native Americans and the contributions of Native Americans to the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary: This resolution supports the recognition of National Native American Heritage Month and Native American Heritage Day.
